amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the FDA from enforcing laws that ban the re-importation of drugs originally manufactured in the United States by anyone other than the manufacturer.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 20 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit use of funds for enforcement of section 801(d)(1) of the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sanders amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 159 - 267 (Roll no. 216).
